tests.name: Old LinkedIn URL Format Test
tests.description: Should return 400 Bad Request with helpful error message

details.cassidy_error:
Cassidy workflow failed: The provided URL is not a valid LinkedIn profile URL.

URL: *https://www.linkedin.com/pub/richard-harris/8/946/143*

suggestions: Use the modern LinkedIn URL format: https://www.linkedin.com/in/username
Avoid old LinkedIn URL formats like /pub/ which are no longer supported
Ensure the LinkedIn URL is publicly accessible

tests.name: Modern LinkedIn URL Format Test
tests.description: Should successfully process and return 201 Created
